channel.title: I need serious No-ip help!
channel.description:
UHH! I have been like port forwarding for ages now... I will send you what Ive done and maybe you could correct me and tell me if Im doing something wrong.
Ok i have a client and a server. I downloaded and made a no-ip account: [IMG]http://i176.photobucket.com/albums/w195/Eportal360/noip.jpg[/img]
And then I need to port forward. I have a Microsoft router version MN-700. This is what I did:
[IMG]http://i176.photobucket.com/albums/w195/Eportal360/BSMT1.jpg[/img] Then I went to security then to port forwarding, then I clicked on Set up persistent port forwarding this is what I got:
[IMG]http://i176.photobucket.com/albums/w195/Eportal360/BSMT2.jpg[/img] Then I filled out all the crap and got this: [IMG]http://i176.photobucket.com/albums/w195/Eportal360/BSMT3.jpg[/img]
Is it supposed to be UDP or TCP? i donno that. Then I started No-ip and started Moparscape then for server I put fyrescape.no-ip.org, and I also tried putting my IP as the server but it Didn't work. So can anybody tell my my faults Plz?

item.title: I need serious No-ip help!

okay well. dont be so stubborn. i was just asking
